# Energy Aegis (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Duskblade Spells|Duskblade 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 111

*A nigh-invisible ripple of magical energy courses through the creature touched, granting it resistance against one type of energy specified by you during the casting the spell.*

When you cast *energy aegis,* specify an energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). Against the next attack using this energy type that targets the subject, it gains resistance 20.
